WorkItem.Description:
Self-created item to keep better track changes to model RestoSham
Â 
Goals in Order:
1.  Remove last of old code.
2.  Remove three gemming templates.
3.  Make sequences a choice to fit a more broad range of healers, allowing you to better gear for playstyle.
4.  Add changes for fixed water shield
5.  Make all Main Hand Weapon enchants not work for shield.  (It keeps putting +30 Int on shield)
6.  Cut down calculations needed by 1/2 to better streamline model.
7.  Add charts for Burst Healing and Sustained Healing.
8.  Add Sustained, Burst, and Time till OOM to the optimizer.
9.  Final verify that all talents show up as a score to better adjust specs.

Comments.Message: Appears #7 and #8 will be removed and simply changed to add OOM to the optimizer.  In all testing, Burst sequences could be used as sustained, so there is no real reason for burst sequences, it should be left up to the shaman to decide when he needs to just use Tidal Force and Nature's Swiftness for the emergency burst.
1, 3, 4, 6, and 8 completed, optimizer working and sequences appear to match WWS data and in-game testing closely.
1-6 and 8-9 Finished as best as possible.  At this time, custom charts are removed from the resto-sham revamp and will be done at a later date.
